Scripts.OnShow: local _, faction = UnitFactionGroup("player") if (faction == DCR_ALLIANCE_NAME) then DecursivePopulateListFrameOtherText:SetText(DCR_LOC_CLASS_PALADIN) DecursivePopulateListFrameOtherText.ClassType = DCR_CLASS_PALADIN else DecursivePopulateListFrameOtherText:SetText(DCR_LOC_CLASS_SHAMAN) DecursivePopulateListFrameOtherText.ClassType = DCR_CLASS_SHAMAN end
